info.description: This is a documents for Rental System REST API.
info.title: MHMarket REST API

parameters.description: Sort field. Accept value[ first_name, last_name, code]
parameters.name: sort

parameters.description: Sort field. Accepts [firstName, lastName]. Default to firstName if not given
parameters.name: sort

parameters.description: Sort direction. Accepts [asc, desc]. Default to asc if not given
parameters.name: direction

parameters.description: Filter By market code. Accepts comma-separated market codes
parameters.name: market_codes

parameters.description: Filter By lease status. Accepts comma-separated numeric string of values [1,2,3,4,5]. Default to 1,2,3
parameters.name: lease_statuses

parameters.description: Filter by payment status. Accepts comma-separated numeric string of values [0,1,2,3]. Omit if not given
parameters.name: payment_statuses

put.description: Confirm the Application to finish the application process
Submit new application documents or update the application documents
Submit new application payment or update the application payment

parameters.description: return draft version ? default to false
parameters.name: draft

get.description: Query location by province, city & ward

post.description: Get Access Token and Refresh Token

get.description: Returns the primary (current) version of markets

parameters.description: search by name or location (district, ward, detail address)
parameters.name: search_term

parameters.description: sort field, default to name, accepts - name, location, types, statuses
parameters.name: sort

parameters.description: sort direction, default to desc, accepts - asc, desc
parameters.name: direction

get.description: Returns the draft (if draft = true) or primary (otherwise) version of markets

parameters.description: should get the draft version or not, default to false
parameters.name: draft

parameters.description: return draft version ? default to false
parameters.name: draft

get.summary: Count and classify stalls by market for rent

parameters.description: Filter by roles. Accepts a comma-separated string.
parameters.name: roles

parameters.description: Sort field. Accepts: [id, type, detail]. Default to id.
parameters.name: sort

parameters.description: Sort direction. Accepts: [asc, desc]. Default to asc
parameters.name: direction

parameters.description: Filter by types. Accept comma-separated numeric string
parameters.name: types

parameters.description: Filter by details. Accept comma-separated numeric string
parameters.name: details

parameters.description: Sort field Accepts: [name,status]. Default to name.
parameters.name: sort

parameters.description: Sort direction Accepts: [asc, desc]. Default to asc
parameters.name: direction

parameters.description: Should include public user role or not. Default to false
parameters.name: include_public

parameters.description: Sort field. Accepts: [id, email, status, username]. Default to id.
parameters.name: sort

parameters.description: Sort direction. Accepts: [asc, desc]. Default to asc
parameters.name: direction

parameters.description: Filter by user id or email or first name or last name
parameters.name: search_term

parameters.description: Include public users in response. Default to false
parameters.name: include_public

parameters.description: Filter by roles. Accepts a comma-separated UUIDs.
parameters.name: roles

current_payment_status.description: only set when accessing Market Lease - related APIs

item_type.description: what stallholder is going to sell

other_occupation.description: Other occupation or source of income

other_rate.description: only one of six next fields should be set
